Uses of Class
camzup.core.MeshDirect

Packages that use MeshDirect 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of MeshDirect in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return MeshDirect 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.calcColorsFromCoords()
    Recalculate vertex colors to visualize the mesh's coordinates.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.calcColorsFromNormals()
    Recalculate vertex colors to visualize the mesh's normals.
    static MeshDirect MeshDirect.fromMesh2​(Mesh2 source, MeshDirect target)
    Converts a Mesh2 to a a direct mesh.
    static MeshDirect MeshDirect.fromMesh3​(Mesh3 source, MeshDirect target)
    Converts a Mesh3 to a a direct mesh.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.reframe()
    Centers the mesh about the origin, (0.0, 0.0, 0.0), and rescales it to the range [-0.5, 0.5] .
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.rotateCoord​(int i, Quaternion q)
    Rotates a coordinate in the mesh by a quaternion.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.rotateCoords​(Quaternion q)
    Rotates all coordinates in the mesh by a quaternion.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoord​(int i, float s)
    Scales a coordinate in the mesh by a uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoord​(int i, float x, float y, float z)
    Scales a coordinate in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoord​(int i, Vec2 v)
    Scales a coordinate in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoord​(int i, Vec3 v)
    Scales a coordinate in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoords​(float s)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoords​(float x, float y, float z)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoords​(Vec2 v)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.scaleCoords​(Vec3 v)
    Scales all coordinates in the mesh by a non uniform scalar.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.set​(int[] indices, float[] coords, float[] texCoords, float[] normals, float[] colors)
    Assigns arrays of data to a mesh.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setColor​(int i, float r, float g, float b, float a)
    Sets a vertex color at an index.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setCoord​(int i, float x, float y, float z, float w)
    Sets a coordinate at an index.

    Sets a coordinate at an index.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setIndex​(int i, int a, int b, int c)
    Sets the indices of a triangle.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setNormal​(int i, float x, float y, float z)
    Sets a normal at an index.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setNormal​(int i, Vec3 v)
    Sets a normal at an index.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setTexCoord​(int i, float x, float y)
    Sets a texture coordinate at an index.
    MeshDirect MeshDirect.setTexCoord​(int i, Vec2 v)

    MeshDirect MeshDirect.transformCoord​(int i, float m00, float m01, float m02, float m03, float m10, float m11, float m12, float m13, float m20, float m21, float m22, float m23, float m30, float m31, float m32, float m33)

    MeshDirect MeshDirect.transformCoord​(int i, Mat4 m)

    Transforms the coordinates in a mesh by a 4x4 matrix.
